alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Caddo; Canadian; Custer; Dewey; Garfield; Kingfisher; Major; Washita (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 8:26PM CDT until June 15 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN WASHITA...KINGFISHER...NORTHWESTERN CADDO... CUSTER...BLAINE...EASTERN DEWEY...SOUTHERN GARFIELD...EASTERN MAJOR AND NORTHWESTERN CANADIAN COUNTIES... At 826 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles east of Lahoma to 5 miles east of Hitchcock to near Bessie, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Enid, Weatherford, Clinton, Watonga, Kingfisher, Fairview, Hennessey, Waukomis, Geary, Okeene, Thomas, Hydro, Arapaho, Canton, Lahoma, Corn, Ringwood, Dover, Drummond, and Custer City. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Blaine; Caddo; Canadian; Custer; Dewey; Garfield; Kingfisher; Major; Washita
